mapper.sql: accommodation_id, accommodation_cate, accommodation_name, accommodation_adress, accommodation_phone, accommodation_totalroom, accommodation_grade, accommodation_detail, accommodation_regdate
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO accommodations ( accommodation_cate, accommodation_name, accommodation_adress, accommodation_phone, accommodation_totalroom, accommodation_grade, accommodation_detail ) VALUES ( #{accommodationCate}, #{accommodationName}, #{accommodationAdress}, #{accommodationPhone}, #{accommodationTotalroom}, #{accommodationGrade}, #{accommodationDetail} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM accommodations ORDER BY accommodation_regdate DESC
select * from accommodations order by accommodation_regdate desc limit 3
mapper.update: update accommodations set accommodation_cate = #{accommodationCate}, accommodation_name = #{accommodationName}, accommodation_adress = #{accommodationAdress}, accommodation_phone = #{accommodationPhone}, accommodation_totalroom = #{accommodationTotalroom}, accommodation_grade = #{accommodationGrade}, accommodation_detail = #{accommodationDetail}
